About me

Greatings! I’m Shiyuan(Sean) Zhang, currently a CS major master’s student at University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign. My research interest lies in trustworthy machine learning, data centric AI, LLM, and machine unlearning. Currently I am fortunate to work with Professor Jiaqi Ma. Prior to this, I completed my Bachelor’s degree also at the UIUC. In life, I have the perfect companionship of this white rag called Lulu.

News

  • [07/2024] One of our ongoing projects about computational copyright is available on Arxiv.
  • [10/2023] Excited to join the TRAIS lab, working with Professor Jiaqi Ma.
  • [05/2023] Proudly graduated from UIUC with Highest Distinction!
  • [04/2023] Honored to keep in the Dean's List all semesters at UIUC.
  • [02/2023] Thrilled to have been admitted to the UIUC Master's program in Computer Science!
